hearthSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
hearthSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

hearthSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
hearthSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
hearthSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

hearthSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
hearthSpire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

hearthSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
hearthSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !hearthSpire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

hearthSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
hearthSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !hearthSpire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

hearthSpire:SkullofIroncladRareSkill.NAME: Skull of Ironclad
hearthSpire:SkullofIroncladRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Outcast . Reduce their cost to 0.

hearthSpire:HandofGuldanUncommonSkill.NAME: Hand of Gul'dan
hearthSpire:HandofGuldanUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: When you play or discard this, draw !M! cards.

hearthSpire:DreadlordBiteCommonAttack.NAME: Dreadlord's Bite
hearthSpire:DreadlordBiteCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Outcast . Deal !M! damage to all enemies.

hearthSpire:EviscerateCommonAttack.NAME: Eviscerate
hearthSpire:EviscerateCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo Deal !M! damage instead.

hearthSpire:OverflowUncommonSkill.NAME: Overflow
hearthSpire:OverflowUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Restore !M! health to all characters. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

hearthSpire:RancorRareAttack.NAME: Rancor
hearthSpire:RancorRareAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain block equal to any unblocked damage they received.

hearthSpire:SnackRunUncommonSkill.NAME: Snack Run
hearthSpire:SnackRunUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to put into your hand. Heal for !M! times the cost of the card. NL Exhaust.

hearthSpire:SoulFragmentCard.NAME: Soul Fragment
hearthSpire:SoulFragmentCard.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Cast when drawn, restore !M! health.

hearthSpire:SoulShearUncommonAttack.NAME: Soul Shear
hearthSpire:SoulShearUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into you draw pile

hearthSpire:ShadowVisionsUncommonSkill.NAME: Shadow Visions
hearthSpire:ShadowVisionsUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Copy a random card from your deck and put it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
hearthSpire:ShadowVisionsUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy a upgraded random card from your deck and put it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

hearthSpire:RenoJacksonUncommonSkill.NAME: Reno Jackson
hearthSpire:RenoJacksonUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Restore 4 health. If your deck has no duplicates (except basic cards), restore another !M! health. NL Exhaust.

hearthSpire:DinotamerBrannUncommonAttack.NAME: Dinotammer Brann
hearthSpire:DinotamerBrannUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your deck has no duplicates (except basic cards), deal another !M! damage.

hearthSpire:InkmasterSoliaRareSkill.NAME: Inkmaster Solia
hearthSpire:InkmasterSoliaRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: If your deck has no duplicates (except basic cards), your next !M! card cost 0.
hearthSpire:InkmasterSoliaRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If your deck has no duplicates (except basic cards), your next !M! cards cost 0.

hearthSpire:PickPocketUncommonSkill.NAME: Pick Pocket
hearthSpire:PickPocketUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Steal NL Add 2 random cards of other colors to your hand. Add a Pick Pocket to your hand. Exhaust.
hearthSpire:PickPocketUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Steal NL Add 2 upgraded random cards of other colors to your hand. Add a Pick Pocket to your hand. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:EtherealPeddlerUncommonSkill.NAME: Ethereal Peddler
hearthSpire:EtherealPeddlerUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: If you're holding any cards from another class, reduce their Cost by 2.

hearthSpire:DragonsHoardRareSkill.NAME: Dragon's Hoard
hearthSpire:DragonsHoardRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Steal NL Choose 1 of 3 Rare cards of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.
hearthSpire:DragonsHoardRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal NL Choose 1 of 3 upgraded Rare cards of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:BackfireUncommonSkill.NAME: Backfire
hearthSpire:BackfireUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Deal 3 damage to yourself, draw !M! cards.

hearthSpire:AcademicEspionageUncommonSki.NAME: Academic Espionage
hearthSpire:AcademicEspionageUncommonSki.DESCRIPTION: Steal NL Shuffle 10 cards of other colors into your draw pile. They cost 1. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:HallucinationUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Steal NL Choose 1 of 3 cards of any color to add into your hand.
hearthSpire:HallucinationUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal NL Choose 1 of 3 upgraded cards of any color to add into your hand.

hearthSpire:TessGreymaneRareSkill.NAME: Tess Greymane
hearthSpire:TessGreymaneRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Replay every card from other colors you've played this combat (targets chosen randomly).

hearthSpire:SpectralCutlassRarePower.NAME: SpectralCutlass
hearthSpire:SpectralCutlassRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card from other colors, gain 2 Block.
hearthSpire:SpectralCutlassRarePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . Whenever you play a card from other colors, gain 2 Block.

hearthSpire:DefileUncommonAttack.NAME: Defile
hearthSpire:DefileUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. If any enemy's health or block end with 0, cast this again. Exhaust.
hearthSpire:DefileUncommonAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. If any enemy's health or block end with 0, cast this again.

hearthSpire:IroncladsSchemeCommonPower.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL gain !M! strength, when retained, gain 1 more strength.
hearthSpire:IroncladsSchemeCommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL gain !M! strength, when retained, gain 1 more strength.

hearthSpire:ScrollofWonderCard.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable . NL Casts When Drawn Cast a random card.
hearthSpire:ScrollofWonderCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable . NL Casts When Drawn Cast a upgraded random card.

hearthSpire:WatchersSchemeCommonAttack.NAME: Watcher's Scheme
hearthSpire:WatchersSchemeCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, when retained, deal 4 more damage. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:DefectsSchemeCommonSkill.NAME: Defect's Scheme
hearthSpire:DefectsSchemeCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Evoke your next orb !M! time, when retained, evoke 1 more time. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:SilentsSchemeCommonSkill.NAME: Silent's Scheme
hearthSpire:SilentsSchemeCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Choose a card. add !M! copies of that card into discard, when retained, add 1 more copy. Exhaust.

hearthSpire:SeekGuidanceRarePower.NAME: Seek Guidance
hearthSpire:SeekGuidanceRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Innate . QuestLine: Play 3 1-Cost cards. Reward: Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

hearthSpire:XyrellatheSanctifiedRareSkil.NAME: Xyrella, the Sanctified
hearthSpire:XyrellatheSanctifiedRareSkil.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle the Purified Shard into your discard pile.

hearthSpire:TheDemonSeedRarePower.NAME: The Demon Seed
hearthSpire:TheDemonSeedRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Innate .Questline: Take 8 damage on your turns. Reward: Deal 8 damage to the enemies. Restore 8 health.

hearthSpire:BlightbornTamsinRarePower.NAME: Blightborn Tamsin
hearthSpire:BlightbornTamsinRarePower.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of the combat, 3 times of damage you take from your cards damages your enemies instead.

hearthSpire:SorcerersGambitRarePower.NAME: Sorcerer's Gambit
hearthSpire:SorcerersGambitRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Innate . QuestLine: Channel 1 Lightning, 1 Frost, 1 Plasma and 1 Dark. Reward: Draw a Skill.

hearthSpire:FinalShowdownRarePower.NAME: Final Show
hearthSpire:FinalShowdownRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Innate . QuestLine: Draw 6 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards in your hand by 1.

hearthSpire:DemonslayerKurtrusSpecialPow.NAME: Demonslayer Kurtrusr
hearthSpire:DemonslayerKurtrusSpecialPow.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by 2.

hearthSpire:DeathGripSpecialSkill.NAME: Death Grip
hearthSpire:DeathGripSpecialSkill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal .Add 1 of 3 random Attack cards to your hand, it costs 0 this turn. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:ObliterateSpecialSkill.NAME: Obliterate
hearthSpire:ObliterateSpecialSkill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal .Your hero takes damage equal to half of its Health. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:DeathCoilSpecialAttack.NAME: Death Coil
hearthSpire:DeathCoilSpecialAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal .Deal 5 damage to an enemy, and restore 5 Health to your hero. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:DeathAndDecaySpecialAttack.NAME: Death and Decay
hearthSpire:DeathAndDecaySpecialAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal .Deal 10 damage to all enemies. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:DoomPactSpecialAttack.NAME: Doom Pact
hearthSpire:DoomPactSpecialAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . Exhaust all your draw pile, deal 5 damage for each exhausted card. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:ArmyOfTheDeadSpecialSkill.NAME: Army of the Dead
hearthSpire:ArmyOfTheDeadSpecialSkill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . Play the top 5 cards of your draw pile. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:FrostmourneSpecialPower.NAME: Frostmourne
hearthSpire:FrostmourneSpecialPower.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . Last 3 turns, replay every card you have played these turns. Exhaust .

hearthSpire:TheLichKingRarePower.NAME: The Lich King
hearthSpire:TheLichKingRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random Death Knight card to your hand.
hearthSpire:TheLichKingRarePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . At the start of your turn, add 1 random Death Knight card to your hand.
